mapper.select: select sum(debt) as debt, sum(payment) as payment from T_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT where month like #{month}

select r.supplierName as supplierName, r.payment as debt, (case when p.payment is null then 0 else p.payment end) as payment from (select supplierName, sum(totlemnt) payment from t_reception group by supplierName) r left join (select tranuser, sum(tranamount) payment from t_transaction where trantype = 2 group by tranuser)p on r.supplierName = p.tranuser where supplierName like #{supplierName}
